name: きりたんvsカニたん -ずんだもちを防衛せよ！-
detailed_description:
Kiritan vs Kanitan "Zunda-mochi defense!" is a 3D tower defense game of Tohoku sisters.
Protect zunda-mochi from crabs, jellyfish and other sea creatures in the southern islands.

Features:
- You can play this game by simple controls.
- You can place many attractive characters on the beautiful islands.
- The player characters have unique attack and animations.
- There are a lot of characters, arrangements and strategies.
- It is easy to restart levels, so you can try a lot of strategies as you like.

short_description: Kiritan vs Kanitan "Zunda-mochi defense!" is a 3D tower defense game of Tohoku sisters. Place cute characters on the map and protect zunda-mochi from crabs, jellyfish and other sea creatures. Play with many cute characters and find efficient strategies to beat enemies!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Required Resolution >= 1280 * 720

legal_notice:
